short_summary: One (1) Mobile Communications Vehicle to be delivered to CFSU Ottawa, Ontario.
description: The Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement to procure one (1) Mobile Communications Vehicle for delivery to CFSU Ottawa, Ontario. The requested delivery date is 120 days after contract award.
full_summary:
### Mobile Communications Vehicle Procurement

**Title:**
Mobile Communications Vehicle

**Reference Number:**
CB-8945-99613230

**Publication Date:**
September 19, 2023

**Closing Date:**
November 2, 2023, 14:00:00 Eastern Standard Time

**Amendment Number:**
6

**Number of Amendments:**
There have been six amendments to the original solicitation.

**Solicitation Number:**
W8476-226506/E

**Solicitation Status:**
Expired

**Classification:**
The Crown's rights to negotiate with suppliers are retained.

**Trade Agreements:**
This procurement is open to suppliers from Canada, as well as those involved in the following trade agreements:

Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)

**Geographic Scope:**
The procurement process is open to providers across the globe.

**Good Services Identification Number (GSIN):**
This procurement uses the General Services and Supplies Services identifier, which is 2320.

**Submission Instructions:**
The Crown invites bids from interested bidders. The submission process will be conducted electronically. Interested bidders must submit their bids via email to the address below:

DLP53BidsReceiving.DAAT53Receptiondessoumissions@forces.gc.ca

**Documents:**
The documents can be downloaded from the Government of Canada Tenders website in both English and French.

**Contact Information:**
For any inquiries, please contact:
Brian James
brian.james3@forces.gc.ca
(819) 939-3299

### Details
* One Mobile Communications Vehicle must be procured for delivery to CFSU Ottawa, Ontario.
* The requested delivery date is 120 days after contract award.
* The contract must be registered under the Controlled Goods Program.
